amendment.description: Amendment adds to the Commission on Role of Medical Education in Reducing Substance Abuse representatives from three psychiatric groups.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that members of the Commission on Role of Medical Education in Reducing Substance Abuse shall include representatives of the American Psychiatric Association, American Academy of Child and Adolescent Psychiatry, and American Academy of Addiction Psychiatry, and establishes a quorum of 7 members.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Portman amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
